description: Fixes bug in `clusterDeleted` waiter for AWS.Redshift.
Adds  new APIs supporting dedicated host reservations. Also adds new property to response of `describeSpotFleetRequests` to indicate  the activity status of spot fleet requests.
eachItem method stops iteration on returning false (like eachPage)
Adds new APIs to support the launch and management of WorkSpaces that are paid for and used by the hour.
